name: ctubio/php-proxy-keyserver
description: PHP proxy and extensible web interface forwarding standard HKP requests to a local SKS OpenPGP Keyserver.

post-create-project-cmd: cd etc && test -e php-proxy-keyserver.ini || cp php-proxy-keyserver.ini.example php-proxy-keyserver.ini
echo "2) Set ${PWD}/pub as the DocumentRoot of your domain in your webserver configs."
echo "When done, please visit your website and validate that you can search/retrieve/submit pgp public keys."
